title: Technology-Enhanced Personalized Science Leadership Education Program

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary science concepts and basic mobile device proficiency
context.additional_context: Strengthening scientific thinking for solving social issues as corporate managers/leaders, utilizing smartphone-accessible VR simulations and customized learning content

learning_goals: Enhance the ability to explain natural phenomena by designing and analyzing science experiments in a VR simulation environment
Achieve over 80% understanding of science concepts using personalized diagnostic tools

Over a 6-month long-term course, learners apply technology-enhanced learning methods (data analysis, AI modeling, etc.) in project-based assessments to propose solutions for 2+ social issues via a 5-step process (problem definition-data collection-analysis-solution development-evaluation), and receive 80+ points (out of 100) from an internal evaluation committee

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
